verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Sons of God,hear his holy word!Gather round the table of the Lord!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Eat his body drink his blood,And we'll sing a song of love.
Allelu.allelu,allelu alleluya.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
1.Brothers sisters we are one,and our life has just began;
In the spirit we are one, we are one forever.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
2.Shout together to the Lord,who has promised our reward;
Happiness a hundredfold,And we'll live forever.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: 3.Jesus gave a new command,That we love our fellow man,Till we reach the promised land,where we'll live forever.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
4.If we want to live with him,we must also die with him;
Die to selfishness and sin,and we'll rise forever.

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: 5.Make the world a unity,make all men one family;Till we meet the trinity.And live with them forever.

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: 6.With the church we celebrate;Jesus' coming we await.So we make a holiday.So we'll live forever.
